summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the provision of project personnel for the implementation of the Third Year Community Development Block Grant Program commencing on July 1, 1977; establishing certain positions in the Departments of Community Development, Public Health, Building, and Parks and Recreation; increasing certain Objects of Expenditure in the 1977 Budgets of said Departments and the Department of Human Resources; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
